head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CUOCO, ERNEST L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CUOCO, ERNEST L.

block.p: CUOCO-Ernest L. On October 27, 2000. Devoted and beloved husband of Mary P. (nee Scandale). Cherished father of Dr. and Mrs. Louis F. Cuoco and Angela M. Cuoco. Unforgettable and special Papa of Dominique. Funeral Tuesday, 8:30 AM, from the Marine Park Funeral Home, 3024 Quentin Rd., Brooklyn, NY. Mass of Christian Burial 9:30 AM at Resurrection R.C. Church. Interment L.I. National Cemetery. Visiting Monday, 2-5 and 7-10 PM.
